# beget_isp_license (Data Source)

Retrieve details of a single ISP Manager license type by plan identifier.

## Fields
- `id`, `type`, `display_name`: license identification and display info
- `primary`: whether this is the default license type
- `billing`: pricing structure with `daily` and `monthly` options

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Retrieve ISP Manager Host license details
data "beget_isp_license" "host" {
  plan = "Host"
}

output "host_license" {
  value = {
    id           = data.beget_isp_license.host.id
    type         = data.beget_isp_license.host.type
    display_name = data.beget_isp_license.host.display_name
    primary      = data.beget_isp_license.host.primary
  }
}
```

### Required

- `plan` (String)

- `additional_info` (String)
- `additional_info_en` (String)
- `billing` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--billing))
- `display_name` (String)
- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `primary` (Boolean)
- `type` (String)
